特記事項: 2023 年度まで開講の「Skills-based English(TOEFL)」との重複履修は不可。
授業方法:
General course format:
This is NOT a lecture class. Lessons are highly student-centered involving individual, pair, and group work. Students are expected to actively contribute to the class, as well as complete their assignments in a timely manner before each class. This course will be taught in English only, and students are expected to use English as much as possible.

第1回: Week 1: Introductions and course overview, Diagnostic test
第2回: Week 2: Reading skills practice: Factual questions
第3回: Week 3: Reading skills practice: Inference
第4回: Week 4: Reading skills practice: Rhetorical questions
第5回: Week 5: Reading skills practice: Vocabulary
第6回: Week 6: Reading skills practice: Sentence insertion
第7回: Week 7: Reading skills practice: Summary or table/chart questions
第9回: Week 9: Writing skills overview and practice: Independent tasks
第10回: Week 10: Writing skills practice: Independent tasks
第11回: Week 11: Writing skills practice: Integrated tasks
第12回: Week 12: Writing skills practice: Integrated tasks
トピック.授業計画1: Please note that the weekly above schedule is for information purposes and may change throughout the semester. Any change will be announced to students in due time.
トピック.授業外学習2: Review each lesson and complete the regular homework assignments in order to be prepared for the following class. This should take approximately two hours per class lesson.

教科書/Required texts1: Paul Edmunds, Nancie McKinnon, Jeff Zeter
Developing Skills for the TOEFL IBT Reading 3rd Edition
